default.$description: Used to define the edge of an avatar.

hover.$description: Used to increase the edge definition of an avatar in the hover state.

red.$description: Red text color for avatar fallback with no particular meaning.

neutral.$description: Neutral text color for avatar fallback with no particular meaning.
